extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays whether or not remote apple events are enabled.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh OS=`/usr/bin/sw_vers -productVersion | /usr/bin/colrm 5` if [[ "$OS" < "10.5" ]]; then if [ -f /System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Support/systemsetup ];then echo "<result>`/System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Support/systemsetup -getremoteappleevents | awk '{print $4}'`</result>" else echo "<result>The systemsetup binary is not present on this machine.</result>" fi else echo "<result>`/usr/sbin/systemsetup -getremoteappleevents | awk '{print $4}'`</result>" fi
